title: turkishmarketing
author: turkishmarketing
content: Hello,As Turkey Crypto Marketing, we bring you valuable project owners and your projects together with Turkish Investors with our existing twitter, telegram and yotube accounts. Turkey is in the top 5 in the crypto market. In this way, you can increase your project awareness and number of transactions.We can also list your projects on the Vulkania website and enable them to be used in competitions in the Vulkania Crypto League and promote them to Turkish users.We have a total of 40,000 completely real Turkish followers. And we have more than 500,000 views.You can reach us via e-mail or Telegram for advertising, sponsorship and marketing transactions related to your projects.Telegram ID :@TurkishmarketingcryptoTwitter ;https://twitter.com/Personeltrader
